messages.subject: Proud mama stuff
messages.msgSnippet: The 3 youngest kids got to go to the radio station with dh this afternoon and make a commercial.  They had the best time.  It isn t profound stuff or anything
messages.messageBody:
The 3 youngest kids got to go to the radio station with dh this afternoon and make a commercial.  They had the best time.  It isn't profound stuff or anything (just a spot for a kitchen shop) but I think it's neat.
 
You can hear it if you want.  I put it up on my website.  
 
The link is:  http://www.geocities.com/wrightway2/commercial.htm
 
You'll hear all three voices mixed in.  They're sooo cute.  Dh is the announcer - love that deep voice! LOL
 
Betsy Wright
 
Child of the King \o/
Wife to my sweetie, David
Mom/Stepmom to:  Michelle, (27yodd), James (14yods), Kelly (10yodd), Zachary (9yods) and Alannah (6 yodd)
